status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8maml","text":"Generating HeLa cells expressing HaloTag-LC3B using pMRX-IP-HaloTag7-LC3 from Mizushima lab (Addgene #184899; DOI: 10.7554/eLife.78923).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"95f59","text":"Seed HeLa cells at 100-150K cells/well in 12-well plate one day before.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"al2uv","text":"Next day, incubate cells with complete DMEM medium and   JF646 HaloTag ligand (Promega) for  , and then wash twice with 1xPBS. The non-starved samples can be harvested immediately by trypsinization (step 5).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":92,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"BAF059D0090E11EEB7FC6F0C238000E8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":30}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"C2E3DF90090E11EEB7FC6F0C238000E8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2tal4","text":"To induce autophagy by starvation, treat cells with EBSS buffer (Gibco) for desired period.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9q62h","text":"After the treatment, harvest the cells by trypsinization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"g317","text":"Incubate the wells with   trypsin at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":37,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f01e2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"E1766950090E11EEB7FC6F0C238000E8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E36037F0090E11EEB7FC6F0C238000E8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"E6047CF0090E11EEB7FC6F0C238000E8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2f63q","text":"Transfer cells into pre-chilled Eppendorf tube, spin  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4l435","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"2000","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F17C9590090E11EEB7FC6F0C238000E8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3jblq","text":"Resuspend the cell pellets in   of lysis buffer and incubate   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":61,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":67,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8f84v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"F809AD80090E11EEB7FC6F0C238000E8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"FA5CEC50090E11EEB7FC6F0C238000E8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"FDB05D10090E11EEB7FC6F0C238000E8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ftjlt","text":"Centrifuge the cell lysate at  . Transfer the cleared lysate into another tube, and measure protein concentration nanodrop spectrophotometer (Thermo Fisher).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2s279","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"21000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"05D9E6F0090F11EEB7FC6F0C238000E8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2c2ac","text":"For each sample, load   clarified lysates onto NuPAGE 4-12% Bis-Tris Gel (Thermo Fisher).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"0CF86970090F11EEB7FC6F0C238000E8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"886b3","text":"For in-gel fluorescence imaging, the gel was immediately visualized with ChemiDoc MP imaging system (Bio-Rad) after SDS PAGE. Band intensities are acquired by exciting samples at 546 nm (mCherry signal) and 647 nm (JF646 HaloTag ligand signal).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
